uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor

Interface CFrameEditor


  • public interface CFrameEditor
    Provides mechanisms for editing a specific CFrame object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CSlot addSlot(CIdentity slotId, CValue<?> valueType, CCardinality cardinality)
      Creates a slot and adds it to the frame.
      void addSlotValue(CIdentity slotId, CValue<?> value)
      Adds a fixed slot-value for the frame, to be automatically assigned to the relevant slots on all instantiations of the frame.
      void addSuper(CFrame sup)
      Adds a direct super-frame for the frame.
      boolean clearSlots()
      Removes all slots from the frame, except for any slots with CSource.internal() sources.
      boolean clearSlotsFromDescendants()
      Removes all slots from all descendant frames, except for any slots with CSource.internal() sources.
      void clearSlotValues()
      Removes all default slot-value specifications for the frame.
      void clearSlotValuesFromDescendants()
      Removes all default slot-value specifications for all descendant frames.
      void clearSupers()
      Removes all direct super-frames for the frame.
      CSlot insertSlot(CIdentity slotId, CValue<?> valueType, CCardinality cardinality, int index)
      Creates a slot and adds it to the frame, positioning it at the specified index within the current set of slots.
      int insertSub(CFrame sub, int index)
      Either adds a direct sub-frame for the frame, positioning it at the specified index within the current set of sub-frames, or, if the supplied frame is already a sub-frame, repositions it to the required index.
      int positionSlot(CIdentity slotId, int index)
      Moves an existing slot to the specified index within the current set of slots.
      boolean removeSlot(CIdentity slotId)
      Removes specified slot from the frame, if possible.
      boolean removeSlotsFromDescendants(CIdentity slotId)
      Removes all slots with specified identity from all descendant frames, except for any such slots with CSource.internal() sources.
      void removeSuper(CFrame sup)
      Removes a direct super-frame for the frame.
      void reorderSlots(java.util.List<CSlot> reorderedSlots)
      Re-orders the current set of slots on the frame.
      void resetLabel(java.lang.String newLabel)
      Resets the label for the frame (as represented within the associated CIdentity object).
      void setSource(CSource source)
      Sets the source for the frame.

    • Method Detail

      • setSource

        void setSource(CSource source)
        Sets the source for the frame.
        Parameters:
        source - Source for frame

      • resetLabel

        void resetLabel(java.lang.String newLabel)
        Resets the label for the frame (as represented within the associated CIdentity object).
        Parameters:
        newLabel - New-label for frame

      • addSuper

        void addSuper(CFrame sup)
        Adds a direct super-frame for the frame.
        Parameters:
        sup - Direct super-frame to add

      • removeSuper

        void removeSuper(CFrame sup)
        Removes a direct super-frame for the frame. Does nothing if specified frame is not a super-frame.
        Parameters:
        sup - Direct super-frame to remove

      • clearSupers

        void clearSupers()
        Removes all direct super-frames for the frame.

      • insertSub

        int insertSub(CFrame sub,
              int index)
        Either adds a direct sub-frame for the frame, positioning it at the specified index within the current set of sub-frames, or, if the supplied frame is already a sub-frame, repositions it to the required index.
        Parameters:
        sub - Sub-frame to insert
        index - Required index within current sub-frames
        Returns:
        Previous index within sub-frames, if applicable, or -1 if new sub-frame
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KAccessException - if specified index is invalid

      • addSlot

        CSlot addSlot(CIdentity slotId,
              CValue<?> valueType,
              CCardinality cardinality)
        Creates a slot and adds it to the frame.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity for slot
        valueType - Value-type for slot
        cardinality - Cardinality for slot
        Returns:
        Created and added slot

      • insertSlot

        CSlot insertSlot(CIdentity slotId,
                 CValue<?> valueType,
                 CCardinality cardinality,
                 int index)
        Creates a slot and adds it to the frame, positioning it at the specified index within the current set of slots.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity for slot
        valueType - Value-type for slot
        cardinality - Cardinality for slot
        index - Required index within current slots
        Returns:
        Created and added slot
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KAccessException - if specified index is invalid

      • positionSlot

        int positionSlot(CIdentity slotId,
                 int index)
        Moves an existing slot to the specified index within the current set of slots.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slot to be moved
        index - Required index within current slots
        Returns:
        Previous index of moved slot

      • reorderSlots

        void reorderSlots(java.util.List<CSlot> reorderedSlots)
        Re-orders the current set of slots on the frame.
        Parameters:
        reorderedSlots - List containing all current slots ordered as required
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KAccessException - If provided list does not contain all current slots and only current slots

      • removeSlot

        boolean removeSlot(CIdentity slotId)
        Removes specified slot from the frame, if possible. Does nothing if slot has a CSource.internal() source, or if no such slot is attached to the frame.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slot to be removed
        Returns:
        True if slot was removed

      • removeSlotsFromDescendants

        boolean removeSlotsFromDescendants(CIdentity slotId)
        Removes all slots with specified identity from all descendant frames, except for any such slots with CSource.internal() sources.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slots are to be removed
        Returns:
        True if all relevant slots were removed

      • clearSlots

        boolean clearSlots()
        Removes all slots from the frame, except for any slots with CSource.internal() sources.
        Returns:
        True if all relevant slots were removed

      • clearSlotsFromDescendants

        boolean clearSlotsFromDescendants()
        Removes all slots from all descendant frames, except for any slots with CSource.internal() sources.
        Returns:
        True if all relevant slots were removed

      • addSlotValue

        void addSlotValue(CIdentity slotId,
                  CValue<?> value)
        Adds a fixed slot-value for the frame, to be automatically assigned to the relevant slots on all instantiations of the frame.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of relevant slot
        value - Fixed value for slot

      • clearSlotValues

        void clearSlotValues()
        Removes all default slot-value specifications for the frame.

      • clearSlotValuesFromDescendants

        void clearSlotValuesFromDescendants()
        Removes all default slot-value specifications for all descendant frames.
